definitions.example: Don't put it off to the last minute.
I'm too busy to see Mr Smith today. I'll have to put him off.

definitions.definition: To distract; to disturb the concentration of.
definitions.example: Please be quiet. I'm trying to concentrate and you're putting me off.

definitions.definition: To cause to dislike; to discourage (from doing).
definitions.example: Almost drowning put him off swimming.
The guest was quite put off by an odor.
All but the most dedicated were put off by the huge task.
